thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Stephen Hightower
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Stephen Hightower

author: Stephen Hightower
title: Stephen Hightower
text: The entire process was a breeze thanks to Brandon Pratt. We had daily contact throughout the entire contract. We started in late Dec '16 and it was funded Feb 28, '17. So only about 2 months. I knew nothing of the Reverse Mortgage but Brandon taught me so much I think I could work for AAG myself. If you are having a hard time keeping up with rising costs, property taxes and insurance I highly recommend AAG and Brandon.
